tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserActivityLog (
    id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    accessed_system TEXT,
    action_performed TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_access_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    remote_system VARCHAR,
    action VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE security_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    details JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE user_access_log (
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    remote_system_id INT,
    login_success BOOLEAN,
    activity VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE user_access_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    access_time TIMESTAMP,
    remote_system_name VARCHAR(255),
    access_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50)
);
